sentences.en: He faces charges of theft and conspiracy to defraud (= a secret plan to cheat someone, made by two or more people ) .
sentences.cn: 他面临偷窃和合谋诈骗的指控。

sentences.en: He passed himself off as the managing director to defraud the bank.
sentences.cn: 他假冒总经理的名义诈骗银行.

sentences.en: His purpose of disguising himself as a wizard is to defraud people of their money.
sentences.cn: 他扮成神汉的目的就是为了骗取钱财.

sentences.en: Land speculators tried to defraud him of his savings.
sentences.cn: 土地投机商们企图骗取他的存款.

sentences.en: She was charged with intent to defraud.
sentences.cn: 她被指控犯有蓄意诈骗钱财罪.

sentences.en: That man is defraud of his estate.
sentences.cn: 那人的产业被人骗去了.

sentences.en: The using of the mail system to defraud the public.
sentences.cn: 利用邮政系统诈骗公众的行为.

sentences.en: To defraud a man in his lawsuit Of these things the Lord does not approve.
sentences.cn: 哀3:36或在人的讼事上、颠倒是非.这都是主看不上的.

trans.tran_en: to trick a person or organization in order to get money from them
